name: Find & Tap: Hidden Objects
description:
Find & Tap is a new, free hidden objects game. You have to find objects in hand-drawn pictures. During the game you will play in different locations: from the beach to the dog show. Dozens of unique locations and hundreds of hidden objects to find are waiting for you. Levels of various tasks are a real challenge for fans of the hidden object genre! It's worth working hard to find everything we've hidden.

How to play?
- examine pictures carefully and look for objects with a simple tap of your finger on the screen
- collect stars and unlock more difficult levels
- look for objects by silhouette, for a while, by name, on a moving picture
zoom in to find more hidden objects
- if some level seems difficult, you can speed up the passage by using the hint

What's interesting about Find & Tap?
- We offer you several game modes:
- Classic. Go through the levels to the stars and open the bonus, for which you will receive a reward.
- Big pictures. We have hidden a lot more items in these pictures. Find them all and get an extra reward!
- Moving picture. Hurry up to find the necessary item before the picture stops!

Who is the game for?
Suitable for the whole family. It requires concentration and a desire to train your mindfulness.

No internet
The game is free and available without an internet connection.

If you have any questions about the game, or ideas for improving it, write to us at info@urmobi.games. We will help you in solving the arisen problems.
